column1: Table 4. Admissions of sentenced offenders to California state prisons, by quarter and offense type, 2010–2011
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Author(s): E. Ann Carson and William J. Sabol
Table 4. Admissions of sentenced offenders to California state prisons, by quarter and offense type, 2010–2011
a/Counts are based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year.
b/Analysis based on National Corrections Reporting Program administrative data.  These data may vary slightly from NPS data because of collection differences.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Corrections Reporting Program, 2010–2011.
